body:
Do you mean the boundary of the performant/performance subspace?  If so I don't think this is clear -- in the definitions above, we define this subspace, but we never use the word "boundary", so here it's not clear to me what "boundary" refers to.

Maybe we can fix this as suggested above by removing the concept of this new subspace.
